extendedIngredients.name: broccoli florets
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (16 ounces) frozen broccoli florets, thawed

extendedIngredients.name: condensed cream of chicken soup
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted

extendedIngredients.name: condensed cream of mushroom soup
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted

recipes.title: Broccoli Turkey Casserole
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large skillet, saute onion and celery in butter until tender. Stir in the turkey, broccoli, soups and rice; transfer to a greased shallow 2-1/2 qt. baking dish.                                                                                           Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 25-30 minutes or until bubbly. Sprinkle with cheese and french-fried onions; bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.                                        Yield: 8 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Broccoli Turkey Casserole in  Simple & DeliciousNovember/December 2009, p16                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 cup equals 344 calories, 17 g fat (7 g saturated fat), 84 mg cholesterol, 758 mg sodium, 20 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 26 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large skillet, saute onion and celery in butter until tender. Stir in the turkey, broccoli, soups and rice; transfer to a greased shallow 2-1/2 qt. baking dish.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 25-30 minutes or until bubbly. Sprinkle with cheese and french-fried onions; bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
